greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: L.g.f.: Sum_{n>=1} a(n)*x^n/n = log(S(x)/x) where S(x) is the g.f. of Stern's diatomic series (A002487).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = 2^(e+1) - 1, a(3^e) = -2 if e>0, a(p^e) = 1 if p>3. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 14 2011
L.g.f.: Sum_{n>=0} log(1 + x^(2^n) + x^(2*2^n)) = Sum_{n>=1} a(n)*x^n/n. - _Paul D. Hanna_, May 04 2014
example: where S(x) is the g.f. of Stern's diatomic series (A002487):
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, Times @@ (Which[ # < 2, 1, # == 2, 2^(#2 + 1) - 1, # == 3, -2, True, 1] & @@@ FactorInteger[n])]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 27 2017 *)
program: (PARI) A002487(n)=local(c=1, b=0); while(n>0, if(bitand(n, 1), b+=c, c+=b); n>>=1); b
(PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, if( n%3, 1, -2) * sigma(2 ^ valuation(n, 2)))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Feb 14 2011 */
(PARI) a(n)=local(X=x+x*O(x^n), A); A=log(1+X+X^2) + sum(k=0, #binary(n), log(1 + X^(2*2^k) + X^(4*2^k))); n*polcoeff(A, n)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 02 2009
